newsitem.title: FRANCE: France's Casino sees double-digit profit growth.
newsitem.headline: France's Casino sees double-digit profit growth.

text.p: French retailer Casino expects double-digit profit growth for the next two to three years, chairman Georges Plassat said in a newspaper interview on Thursday.

"We're going to show significant growth in results at all levels," he told the Figaro newspaper. "We're capable of managing double-digit profit growth for two, three years. For the first time in a long time, we have good visibility."
Its 1996 results are due on March 6. Its 1995 net attributable profit rose 29.4 percent to 633 million francs.
Casino's 1996 sales rose 4.2 percent to 66.84 billion francs.
